location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Government of India, Army Department, General Staff Branch: Index to Summaries of Intelligence from Mesopotamia Expeditionary Force, Nos. 402-421 (Serial No. 39)'

physicalDescription.extent: The foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 9; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The volume, marked as secret, is an index to Summaries of Intelligence from Mesopotamian Expedition Force, numbers 402 to 421. The index consists of subjects arranged in alphabetical order.
